name: Furst-McNess Company Complete Pellet Calf Feeds 18% Total Calf-R36
description: Furst-McNess Company Complete Pellet Calf Feeds 18% Total Calf-R36 is a milk-based diet designed to get calves off to the best start possible based on individual needs and goals. Designed to balance the nutrient requirements of growing calves as their diets shift from primarily liquid to completely dry starter at weaning. Handles easily in bulk, no mixing required and reduces sorting and sorting.

Product Families: Formulated Feeds, Whole Foods and Extracts
